tool_description: Tools for copywriting. Writing (generation) of texts, text rewriting, writing content for social networks. Creating advertisements and real estate listings and more
name: Gerwin AI Beta
title: Gerwin AI Beta

api_list.name: Характеристики товара
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gerwin-ai-beta.p.rapidapi.com/client/products/features/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gerwin-ai-beta.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
